section.title: The unit element information item
section.para: Unit element information items (referred to in this specification as unit elements) are element information items in the CellML 1.1 namespace with local name equal to unit, and with a units element as their parent.

listitem.para: Every unit element MUST contain a units attribute information item in the empty namespace. The value of the units attribute MUST be a valid units reference, as defined in .

A unit element MAY contain any of the following attribute information items in the empty namespace:
The prefix attribute. If present, the value of the attribute MUST meet the constraints specified in .
The offset attribute. If present, the value of the attribute MUST be a real number string.
The multiplier attribute. If present, the value of the attribute MUST be a real number string.
The exponent attribute. If present, the value of the attribute MUST be a real number string.
